TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BasicDesignerLoader extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService
Public MustInherit Class BasicDesignerLoader Inherits DesignerLoader Implements IDesignerLoaderService

summary.span: 提供 接口的实现。

span.span: Provides an implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是设计器加载程序无任何关联的持久性格式的完整实现。A is a complete implementation of a designer loader without anything relating to a persistence format. A并未规定文本或二进制持久性，但它支持以下功能：A does not dictate either a text or binary persistence, but it does support the following features: - 多个负载依赖项。Multiple load dependencies. - 设计器中的跟踪更改。Tracking changes within the designer. - 延迟空闲时间重新加载。Deferred idle-time reloading. A将两个类型的服务添加到设计器宿主的服务容器： 可替换的服务和不可替代的服务。A adds two kinds of services to the designer host’s service container: replaceable services and irreplaceable services. 你可以通过更改受保护的值来替换可替换的服务属性。You can replace a replaceable service by changing the value of the protected property. 不能替换不可替代的服务，因为其实现互相依赖。You cannot replace irreplaceable services because their implementations depend on each other. 下表描述默认提供的服务。The following table describes the services that are provided by default. |默认服务Default Service|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||允许对象请求设计器重新本身在空闲时加载。Allows objects to request that the designer reload itself when it is idle. 这是可替换的服务。This is a replaceable service.| ||用于序列化和反序列化对象。Used to serialize and deserialize objects. 序列化管理器添加为服务中，因此需要执行序列化的对象可以利用已添加到序列化管理器的任何序列化提供程序。The serialization manager is added as a service so objects that need to perform serialization can utilize any serialization providers that were added to the serialization manager. 这是不可替代的服务。This is an irreplaceable service.|

permission.span: 对系统资源的完全访问权限。

span.span: for full access to system resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是抽象的实现方法。This is an implementation of the abstract method. 不需要重写此方法在您自己的类。You do not need to override this method in your own class. 方法执行下列操作：The method performs the following actions: - 它验证设计图面具有尚未加载。It verifies that the design surface has not already loaded. - 在首次调用中，它将添加相关服务和调用方法。On the first call, it adds relevant services and calls the method. - 它调用， ，和方法。It calls the , , and methods. 如果未从服务容器中，删除设计器加载程序服务将调用和方法而不是和方法。If the designer loader service has not been removed from the service container, will call the and methods instead of the and methods. 在此情况下，它是要调用的设计器加载程序服务的责任和。In this situation, it is the responsibility of the designer loader service to call and .

span.span: is .

exception.span: 设计器已经加载，或者已经使用其他设计器加载程序宿主调用了 。

span.span: The designer is already loaded, or has been called with a different designer loader host.
has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法不会刷新到设计器加载程序的更改。Calling the method does not flush changes to the designer loader. 如果你想要保存的更改，则调用之前调用。If you want changes to be saved, call before calling . 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化服务。

span.span: Initializes services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法称为第一次调用。The method is called the first time is invoked. 你可以在此时间添加任何所需的设计器加载程序宿主的服务。You can add any services necessary to the designer loader host at this time. 基实现，将添加服务提供，因此在调用基实现后可以替换现有的服务。The base implementation adds services that provides, so after calling the base implementation you may replace existing services. 你必须删除您在通过重写此处添加任何自定义服务。You must remove any custom services you add here by overriding .

span.span: The has not been initialized.
The has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsReloadNeeded() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function IsReloadNeeded () As Boolean

summary.span: 指示是否应该重新加载设计器。

span.span: Indicates whether the designer should be reloaded.

returns.span: 如果应重新加载设计器，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the designer should be reloaded; otherwise, .
The default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于通过某些设计器加载程序优化重新加载。The method is used by some designer loaders to optimize reloading. 如果你的设计器加载程序支持智能重新加载，则可以重写此方法。This method can be overridden if your designer loader supports intelligent reloading. 某些设计器加载程序可以检测到它们的基础文档所做的更改，并确定是否实际需要的设计器重新加载。Some designer loaders can detect changes made to their underlying document and determine if a reload of the designer is actually necessary. 如果不是，它们应返回`false`从此方法。If not, they should return `false` from this method. 默认实现始终返回`true`，，该值指示任何调用到将会成功。The default implementation always returns `true`, indicating that any call to will succeed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定是否设计器加载程序检测到设计器尚未修改。Determines if the designer loader has detected that the designer has been modified. 如果此属性为`true`时设计器加载程序方法被调用时，设计器加载程序将调用方法。If this property is `true` when the designer loader’s method is called, the designer loader will call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBeginLoad() cil managed

summary.span: 通知设计器加载程序加载即将开始。

span.span: Notifies the designer loader that loading is about to begin.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用以启动加载过程。The method is invoked to start the loading process. 适用于在此时加载的应执行任何必要的初始化。You should perform any necessary initialization for loading at this time. 此方法不应该用于执行实际负载。This method should not be used to perform the actual load. 默认实现禁用更改通知，并设置加载。The default implementation disables change notifications and sets up the for loading. 如果你实现以提供依赖加载支持，应调用依赖在首次加载时。If you implement to provide dependent load support, you should call when the first dependent load occurs. 调用方法之后上次调用方法。Call the method after the last call to the method. 默认情况下，实现和为您这么做。By default, implements and does this for you. 如果不可用时调用时，将直接调用。If is not available when is called, will directly call . 如果你提供自己的加载程序服务，或者如果你选择不提供加载程序服务，你负责调用此方法。If you provide your own loader service, or if you choose not to provide a loader service, you are responsible for calling this method. 方法将自动调用此操作，请通过调用间接如果不可用，或直接如果它不是。The method will automatically call this, either indirectly by calling if is available, or directly if it is not.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBeginUnload() cil managed

summary.span: 通知设计器加载程序卸载即将开始。

span.span: Notifies the designer loader that unloading is about to begin.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将要卸载文档设计器加载程序时，会调用方法。The method is invoked when the designer loader is about to unload the document. 文档可能卸载准备重新加载，或如果该文档无法加载。The document may be unloaded in preparation for reloading, or if the document failed to load. 如果你添加特定于文档中的服务或，此处将其移除。If you added document-specific services in or , remove them here.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnEndLoad (bool successful, System.Collections.ICollection errors);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnEndLoad(bool successful, class System.Collections.ICollection errors) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnEndLoad (successful As Boolean, errors As ICollection)
protected: virtual void OnEndLoad(bool successful, System::Collections::ICollection ^ errors);

param.name: successful
param.span: 如果已成功地完成了加载，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the load completed successfully; otherwise, .

param.name: errors
param.span: 包含被报告为错误的对象（通常是异常）的 。

span.span: An containing objects (usually exceptions) that were reported as errors.

summary.span: 通知设计器加载程序加载已完成。

span.span: Notifies the designer loader that loading is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成加载后调用方法。The method is invoked when loading is finished. 它始终调用，即使在加载过程中引发异常。It is always called, even if an exception is thrown during loading. 值`successful`将设置为`true`如果加载成功，或`false`如果发生错误。The value of `successful` will be set to `true` if the load succeeded, or `false` if a fatal error occurred. `errors`集合将包含作为错误进行报告的对象。The `errors` collection will contain objects that were reported as errors. 通常情况下，这些对象是异常。Usually, these objects are exceptions. 如果你实现以提供依赖加载支持，应调用方法之后上次调用方法。If you implement to provide dependent load support, you should call the method after the last call to the method. 默认情况下，实现和为您这么做。By default, implements and does this for you. 如果不可用时调用时，将直接调用之后调用。If is not available when is called, will directly call after calling . 所有依赖加载已完成时，应由设计器加载程序服务调用此方法。This method should be called by the designer loader service when all dependent loads have been completed. 这将停止由启动加载过程方法。This stops the loading process that was initiated by the method. 如果你提供自己的加载程序服务，或者如果你选择不提供加载程序服务，你负责调用此方法。If you provide your own loader service, or if you choose not to provide a loader service, you are responsible for calling this method. 方法将自动调用此操作，请通过调用间接方法如果不可用，或直接如果它不是。The method will automatically call this, either indirectly by calling the method if is available, or directly if it is not.

span.span: The has not been initialized.
The has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnModifying() cil managed

summary.span: 通知设计器加载程序即将修改文档的状态。

span.span: Notifies the designer loader that the state of the document is about to be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用对组件的不断变化，响应中添加，或者删除设计器的事件，该值指示是否将要修改。The method is called in response to a component changing, adding, or removing event which indicates that the designer is about to be modified. 你可以通过重写此方法实现源代码管理。You can implement source code control by overriding this method. 调用并不意味着更高版本将属性设置为`true`; 它只是表示为此目的。A call to does not mean that the property will later be set to `true`; it merely indicates an intention to do so.

summary.span: 排队设计器的重新加载。

span.span: Queues a reload of the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请求的设计器重新加载设计器加载程序可以调用方法。The method can be invoked by the designer loader to request a reload of the designer. 因为在空闲时执行的重新加载需要，此方法不会不实际重新加载设计器;它只需队列重新加载。Because reloads are performed at idle time, this method does not actually reload the designer; it just queues the reload.

Sub DependentLoadComplete (successful As Boolean, errorCollection As ICollection) Implements IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete

param.name: successful
param.span: 如果加载成功，则为 ；否则为 。

param.name: errorCollection
param.span: 包含加载期间发生的错误的 。

span.span: An containing errors that occurred during the load.

summary.span: 发出信号表示已完成依赖加载。

span.span: Signals that a dependent load has finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用，以便通知依赖加载操作已完成。The method is called to signal that a dependent loading operation has completed. 调用一次为每个进程都已由调用注册方法方法，已完成。Call the method once for every process that was registered by calling the method, which has already completed. 如果依赖加载成功，调用方集`successful`参数`true`并传递空集合或`null`到`errorCollection`参数。If the dependent load succeeds, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `true` and passes either an empty collection or `null` to the `errorCollection` parameter. 如果依赖加载遇到错误，调用方将设置`successful`参数`false`并将传递的指示或多个与失败的原因的异常集合`errorCollection`参数。If the dependent load encounters errors, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `false` and passes a collection of exceptions that indicate the reason or reasons for failure to the `errorCollection` parameter.

exception.span: 未添加任何加载依赖项，或者 尚未初始化。

span.span: No load dependencies have been added by , or the has not been initialized.
The has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.Reload() cil managed

returns.span: 如果接受重新加载请求，则为 ；如果加载程序不允许重新加载，则为 。

span.span: if the reload request is accepted; if the loader does not allow the reload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何对象都可以调用方法来请求加载程序重新加载设计文档。Any object can call the method to request that the loader reload the design document. 如果加载程序支持重新加载并执行重新加载，则设计器加载程序可以返回`true`。If the loader supports reloading and complies with the reload, the designer loader can return `true`. 否则，它将返回`false`，指示将不会发生重新加载。Otherwise, it returns `false`, indicating that the reload will not occur. 调用方不能依赖立即; 发生重新加载设计器加载程序可以计划这段时间，或它可以尝试重新加载设计器在一次。Callers cannot rely on the reload happening immediately; the designer loader can schedule this for some other time, or it can try to reload the designer at once. 如果无法重新加载设计器，调用方可以向用户显示一条消息。The caller can display a message to the user if the designer cannot be reloaded.
